text: Tri dnya Viktora Chernyshova () is a 1968 Soviet drama movie directed by Mark Osepyan.Ушел из жизни известный актер театра и кино Геннадий Корольков: биографияТРИ ДНЯ ВИКТОРА ЧЕРНЫШЕВА It stars Gennadi Korolkov, Valentina Vladimirova, and Alexey Chernov. == Actors == * Gennadi Korolkov as Viktor Chernyshev * Valentina Vladimirova as Katerina, Viktor's Mother * Alexey Chernov as Uncle Pavel * Lev Prygunov as Anton * Gennady Sayfulin as Kolya * Valeri Belyakov as Pyotr == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1968 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Tri dnya Viktora Chernyshova
